SOCIAL MEDIA

Hello, I'm Conrad!

I am a software engineer at Bank of America in New York, NY. I graduated in 2021 from Bowdoin College with a major in Computer Science and a minor in Sociology (and Economics, informally). I am interested in the intersection between tech and education, specifically providing opportunities for first-gen college students like myself.

For summer 2020, I was a Global Tech Analyst at Bank of America where my team delivered the top three time series prediction models for daily ATM volume estimations out of all intern groups.

At this time, I am not looking for a job, but I am open to new opportunities! I am interested in exploring product management and software engineer. I have experience with Python, Java, C++, Kotlin, HTML, CSS/SASS, JS, machine learning models, agile development, and a willingness to learn.
